markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 133 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A _librarian staff_ is a slender pole composed of thousands of coiled and compressed book pages swirling into one another, with a mishmash of letters tumbling across its surface. The sound of rustling pages can be heard when the staff moves. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Librarian Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 133 1.1 **Price** 225 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_approximate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=864), [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
  • **1st** [_pocket library_](/Spells.aspx?ID=970), [_quick sort_](/Spells.aspx?ID=978), [_share lore_](/Spells.aspx?ID=584)
  • **2nd** [_comprehend language_](/Spells.aspx?ID=46), [_timely tutor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1020)
Librarian Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 133 1.1 **Price** 1,750 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The staff can store up to 100 texts.
  • **3rd** _comprehend language_, _pocket library_, _quick sort_, _share lore_
  • **4th** _comprehend language_
  • **5th** _quick sort_, _share lore_
name: Librarian Staff
